name: Utilities
description: This is a library of utility constants and methods for other classes in this project.

constants.name: CUBLET_EDGE
constants.description: Integer label to identify a Cublet of type Edge

constants.name: CUBLET_CORNER
constants.description: Integer label to identify a Cublet of type Corner

constants.name: CUBLET_CENTER
constants.description: Integer label to identify a Cublet of type Center

constants.name: CUBLET_CORE
constants.description: Integer label to identify a the core of the Rubik's Cube, which has no corresponding Cublet object type

methods.name: typeOfCublet()
methods.description: Returns one of the integer lables for the type of Cublet that should be at location (x, y, z)
